title: What is 'Moment.js'?

options.b: A JavaScript library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates and times
options.c: A calendar application

options.b: Working with dates and times in JavaScript
options.c: Scheduling events

options.b: A JavaScript object representing a moment in time
options.c: A photography moment
